[[inst_subw]]
==== SUBW

*Syntax:* subw SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Subtract 32-bit registers (word operation).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_subw.svg[SUBW encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
